mapper.sql: dept_id "deptId", pid "pid", pids "pids", simple_name "simpleName", full_name "fullName", description "description", sort "sort", create_time "createTime", update_time "updateTime", create_user "createUser", update_user "updateUser"
mapper.select: select dept_id "id", pid "pid", simple_name "title", ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "spread" from sys_dept
select dept_id "id", pid "pId", simple_name "name", ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) "open" from sys_dept

select
from sys_dept where 1 = 1
and simple_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or full_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and (dept_id = #{deptId} or dept_id in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
order by sort ASC
